page.title: 04LOCAL POLICE WORK
page.content: There are two local policemen in the area.One of them was interviewed by our class.This is what we found out:-Most crimes here are {traffic offences,housebreaking, } and{vandalism.}It was felt that more policing was needed, not to solve crime , but to provide police to give a service to the community. {Computers}have streamlined much of the work and made police investigation more efficient by the storing of data for immediate retrieval and reference. The major changes noticed in society generally over the last 20 years, are the deterioration of the general behaviour of{teenagers,}and the increase in the amount of{vandalism. } Policing our area combines very quiet spells with spells of intense activity coinciding with local events.
